import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Delete order
 Deletes order by UUID



`Function DeleteOrder(Val Token, Val UUID, Val TestAPI = False) Export`

  | Parameter | CLI option | Type | Required | Description |
  |-|-|-|-|-|
  | Token | --token | String | &#x2714; | Auth token |
  | UUID | --uuid | String | &#x2714; | Order UUID for deletion |
  | TestAPI | --testapi | Boolean | &#x2716; | Flag to use test API for requests |

  
  Returns:  Map Of KeyAndValue - serialized JSON response from CDEK

<br/>

:::tip
Method at API documentation: [Deleting an order](https://api-docs.cdek.ru/33828855.html)
:::
<br/>



```bsl title="1C:Enterprise/OneScript code example"
    Token = "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9....";
    UUID  = "6b24557d-24df-4379-ba05-d0a8d4c68b5c";

    Result = OPI_CDEK.DeleteOrder(Token, UUID, True);
```
 

 <Tabs>
  
    <TabItem value="bash" label="Bash" default>
        ```bash
            oint cdek DeleteOrder \
             --token "***" \
             --uuid "21ceabf6-953e-43b3-9cef-318c783fcdd4" \
             --testapi "***"
        ```
    </TabItem>
  
    <TabItem value="bat" label="CMD/Bat" default>
        ```batch
            oint cdek DeleteOrder ^
             --token "***" ^
             --uuid "21ceabf6-953e-43b3-9cef-318c783fcdd4" ^
             --testapi "***"
        ```
    </TabItem>
</Tabs>


```json title="Result"
{
 "entity": {
  "uuid": "9be16b20-ecaa-4943-b3da-588ffbcf6b54"
 },
 "requests": [
  {
   "request_uuid": "cdaf6911-1bc8-493b-9e4a-8c8573480b38",
   "type": "DELETE",
   "date_time": "2025-09-12T16:48:47+00:00",
   "state": "ACCEPTED"
  }
 ],
 "related_entities": []
}
```
